items.headline: How to Find and Implement Your Best Path to Publishing Success
objectives_summary: Understand your Author Personality and how it affects your publishing journey.
Discern which path to publication, independent or traditional, is best for you.
Learn how to get an agent, find an editor, or independently self-publish your book.

objectives_summary: Foundations of Podcasting
Social Media Marketing

items.title: Audiovisual Translation and Subtitling Course
items.headline: Learn the principles of Subtitling, Dubbing, and More
objectives_summary: Knowledge of best practices in subtitling and dubbing, and the ability to apply them to fragments of movies, documentaries, and shows that you will translate into your target language
The ability to use open-source software to create subtitles and dubbing scripts
The skills to translate and localize video content (movies, documentaries, and shows) into your target language

items.title: Video Editing Essentials for Instructors and Professionals
items.headline: Learn step by step video Editing with practical examples, and make your videos look professional and amazing
objectives_summary: Make their videos look professional
Add different kind of effects to their videos
Editing different parts of videos effeciently, without loss of any quality.

items.headline: Ever wanted to start your own podcast? Now you can in just a few days without any technical skills or expensive gear.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to plan, record, edit, publish and promote your own podcast.
You'll learn how to build authority and establish your own audience
You'll learn monetization and advanced content marketing and distribution techniques

items.title: The Book as iPad App
items.headline: Interactive ebooks and their future for education. Learn how new book formats are enabling better learning experiences.
objectives_summary: familiarity with some of the best books apps currently available and understanding of what makes them the best
specific information to help you become an expert reviewer of book apps
ideas and inspiration for creating your own interactive books (a future course)

Use screen background as virtual stationery
Change the height and width of the Editor

items.title: Self-Publish Paperback Books With Images Using Createspace
items.headline: A Detailed Step By Step Course Showing Exactly How to Convert Any Digital Book With or Without Images to a Hard Copy
objectives_summary: Self publish a paperback book using the free platform Createspace
Quickly upload your book using my pre-formatted word template
Optimize image resolution for hard copy print books

objectives_summary: Understand exactly what self-publishing is and the best way to do it in 2018 and beyond.
Learn how to successfully think about self-publishing and how to see it as a business.
Effectively set time lines for achieving income goals.

items.title: How to be an expert voice artist, up your game and get paid
items.headline: Award winning voice actor shows you how to improve your voice for podcasts, videos and earn an income with your voice.
objectives_summary: This course is for voice- over actors, MC's, podcasters, Youtubers and poeple looking at using their voice to make a living.
Learn how to access your voice so audiences stop, listen and take notice.
Follow essential techniques  by award-winning voice actor who shows you exactly how top use your voice to be effective in advertising, podcasts, presenting .

items.title: Become from Shy to super Confident in front of the camera
items.headline: you can become a master of this game, to be in front of the camera
objectives_summary: You will become incredibly confident in front of the camera and will be the best version of your personality! Because you will feel so cool in front of the camera, probably you will fall in love with this game -  to be in front of the camera!
